definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Frosted slides are sandblasted for marking specimens.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂的載玻片經噴砂處理以標記標本。

sentences.english: The cells were harvested and microscope slides were prepared before Giemsa staining.
sentences.chinese: 收穫細胞及制玻片後，姬姆薩染液染色。

sentences.english: Myosin motors can be attached to the surface of a glass slide.
sentences.chinese: 肌球蛋白馬達可附着在載玻片表面。

sentences.english: A novel inspection culture glass sheet belongs to the technical field of medical appliances.
sentences.chinese: 新型檢驗培養玻片，屬於醫療用具技術領域。

sentences.english: A novel sperm detection glass slide belongs to the technical field of medical appliances.
sentences.chinese: 新型精子檢測載玻片，屬於醫療用具技術領域。

sentences.english: Methods The titer and affinity of anti-A secreted by hybridoma were tested by tube method and slide method.
sentences.chinese: 通過試管法和玻片法檢測抗A抗體的效價和親和力。

sentences.english: Hemostasia was assessed by the methods of glass tube and glass plate.
sentences.chinese: 止血實驗採用毛細玻璃管法和載玻片法。

sentences.english: Scraping slide technique improved the method of making temporary slides.
sentences.chinese: 刮片法改進了臨時玻片的製作方法。

sentences.english: He uses cover slips to prepare permanent visual records.
sentences.chinese: 他用蓋玻片來準備永久標本。

sentences.english: He stained some slides and looked at them under the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 他給幾張載玻片上染了色，然後放到顯微鏡下觀察。

sentences.english: Micro coverslips are unbreakable and non-curling.
sentences.chinese: 蓋玻片不易損壞，沒有扭曲面。

sentences.english: Cells on cover slips were subjected to immunofluorescence staining.
sentences.chinese: 長有細胞的蓋玻片處理後進行細胞免疫熒光染色。

sentences.english: Frosted slides are sandblasted on one end of one side.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂的載玻片在一面的一端經過噴砂處理。

sentences.english: Semiquantitative slide agglutination and single-tube Widal tests performed poorly.
sentences.chinese: 半定量玻片凝集試驗和單管維達爾試驗效果不佳。

sentences.english: Immunohistochemical glass covers were dealt with DEPC for use.
sentences.chinese: 免疫組化載玻片用DEPC處理後備用。
